paragraphs.content: What do you do with a cookie jar? Naturally, you crack it open and snatch a piece of cookie.

The concept with SavvyJar is similar, although, the jar itself is imaginary or rather it's contained within the boundaries of this site. Instead of cracking it open, you choose a category, click on its button and receive your cookie - manifested as a piece of rationale or good wisdom that will hopefully make you stop and think for a second or two.
